Description:
CANNONEER: I've devised a camouflage based on that used by Wreckships. I thought with your history -
MAGICIAN: That I'd have something to contribute? Well, how about this: What do you think the Admiralty will do to our little ship if they see it all dressed up like a wrecker?
CANNONEER: ...This is just a prototype. I hadn't thought that far yet.
MAGICIAN: Perhaps you'd better start.
Name: Overheard at Zee: Precautionary Measures
